description: eight barefooted figures wearing identical garments (black and orange plaid skirts, pale pink star-patterned garments on upper body trimmed with tan fabric with orange flowers on shoulders, and headbands), with a fantastic animal-headed costume with tan and orange patterned fabric body and black hairy tail in ULC; figure at lower left holds a fan
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Niwaka Festival Skits by the Geisha of the Pleasure Quarters (Seirō geiko Niwaka kyōgen zukushi 青楼芸子俄狂言尽)
title: Lion Dance by Ichi, Naokichi, Kayo, Ise, Riyo, Hide, Rika, and Yae
